page.title: 04TYPES OF HOUSING
page.content: There are several kind of houses in our block. On the{Shore Rd.}most of the houses are large owner occupied villas which are surrounded by gardens On either side of SchoolRd.are housing developments.Fairfield Gardens was built to house people who had lost their homes when{Hillhead Cottages}was destroyed in a fire in 1947.On the right hand side of{School}Rd.is{Meikle {Aiden Brae}these houses are privately owned and many of the people who live here work at{R.N.A.D. Coulport The school is just across the road from Meikle Aiden and the{Playgroup meet in the old school next door. As you can see there is great variety in the types of housing in our block and this is because it has been built over a period of a hundred and fifty years as the need arose. .
